data.message: Hello fb Idk is it bcoz my problem or what my name went wrong. My last name is supposed to be Gina and first name is supposed to be Chiu. Could you help me with it?

replies.message: Thanks for reaching out, Chiu. To learn more about changing your name on Facebook, please visit our Help Center: http://bit.ly/2dNubGY. We hope that helps! -Joe

Chiu they might not let you change it due to FB abusively controls how someone puts their name on FB. FB abusively controls what e-mail a person can use on their account, too. It isn't good business for them to not have numbers where they can be reached by phone, either, because if something goes wrong with your account or you are falsely accused of having a fake name you have no way to fix choosing your name on FB.
It's interesting that they provide help center but when i can't fix my problem i can't even contact them or write to thier human employees. Sadly can only get auto-answer here.
